text: I have a question about using responsive custom modules in an email created with the drag and drop email designer. Normally in our emails we put media queries in a style tag in the <head> of the email, but in the drag and drop editor we donâ€™t have access to the head tag so I am not sure where to add my media queries. Would love to hear other ideas or ways around this.

You can't make wholesale changes with the drag and drop editor but I know it's an area they're working on.

My ideal situation would be the ability to point to a base template (partial) which passes through (as a block) the assorted modules `{% block modules %}{% endblock %}` you dragged into place to a layout template via an extend.
I'm sure <@U24DCSJBE> is working hard on this!
